description: Yandex is a Russian multinational technology company specializing in Internet-related services and products. Yandex operates the largest search engine in Russia with about 65% market share in that country.The Static API generates a map image based on the parameter values passed to the service.

blocks.name: getStaticMap
blocks.description: The Static API generates a map image in accordance with the values ​​of the parameters passed to the service.

args.name: l
args.info: The list of layers that determine the type of map: map and sat, skl (hybrid),trf.

args.name: ll
args.info: Longitude and latitude of the center of the map in degrees.

args.name: spn
args.info: The length of the map display area by longitude and latitude (in degrees).

args.name: z
args.info: The zoom level of the map (0-17).

args.name: size
args.info: The width and height of the requested map image (in pixels), see Map size. The default value is 450x450.

args.name: scale
args.info: The coefficient of magnification of objects on the map. Can take a fractional value from 1.0 to 4.0.

args.name: pt
args.info: Contains descriptions of one or more labels that you want to display on the map.

args.name: pl
args.info: Contains a set of descriptions of geometric shapes (polygons and polygons) that you want to display on the map.

args.name: lang
args.info: API allows you to display maps, localized in different languages, taking into account the specifics of individual countries.
